category: Competitor Registration Regulations/Article 3 (Establishment/revision of regulations for member sports organizations)
contents: Article 3 (Enactment and revision of regulations of member sport organizations) ① In accordance with these regulations, member sport organizations shall enact and revise regulations for the matters necessary for the registration and activities of competitors of the relevant sport, subject to resolution by the relevant board of directors for each member sport organization. It must be reported to the Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as the *Sports Council). ② If the provisions of the regulations for each member sport organization pursuant to paragraph 1 unreasonably restrict the registration or activities of athletes or contain other unreasonable contents, the Sports Council may recommend correction to the member sport organization, and the member sport organization may recommend correction of the matter. must be followed unless there are special circumstances. Revised May 4, 2023
